docs.title: Getting Started with InfiniteBot
docs.text: Welcome to InfiniteBot — your all-in-one Discord assistant! This quick guide will help you invite InfiniteBot to your server and get it up and running in no time.

docs.title: Step 1: Invite InfiniteBot to Your Server
docs.text: Click here to invite InfiniteBot and give it the permissions it needs.

docs.title: Step 2: Quick Setup Commands
docs.text:
Configure InfiniteBot in under 30 seconds using the commands below. Simply run them in your server chat or via the slash command interface:

  • /setup_ai Enabled:true/false Enable or disable the AI Chatting feature.

  • /setup_reportlog channel:#channel-name Set the channel where all reports and automod logs will be sent.

  • /setup_moderation Enabled:true/false Enable or disable moderation features.

  • /setup_welcome channel:#channel-name Choose the channel for welcome messages.

  • /setup_leave channel:#channel-name Choose the channel for goodbye messages.

docs.title: Commands Overview
docs.text: Here is a list of InfiniteBot commands grouped by category:

docs.title: 🛡️ Moderation¹
docs.text:
• /setup_moderation <enabled: true/false> — Enable/disable auto moderation
  • Other commands soon...

docs.title: 📅 Question of the Day (QOTD)¹
docs.text: • /forceqotd — Send a QOTD as you send the command

docs.title: Welcome and Goodbye Messages¹
docs.text:
• /setup_welcome <channel> — Change the channel where to send welcome messages
  • /setup_leave — Change the channel where to send goodbye messages
  • Changing text and enabling/disabling is coming soon

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
• /setup_ai Enabled:true/false Enable or disable the AI Chatting feature.

  • /setup_reportlog channel:#channel-name Set the channel where all reports and automod logs will be sent.

  • /setup_moderation Enabled:true/false Enable or disable moderation features.

  • /setup_welcome channel:#channel-name Choose the channel for welcome messages.

  • /setup_leave channel:#channel-name Choose the channel for goodbye messages.

¹ - Other commands are coming soon
